model

Class Tweet

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Tweet

  • public class Tweet
extends java.lang.Object
    The class stores details about a tweet and creates an inverted index on the stored tweet if requested.
    Author:
    Tudor Sirbu, Cristi Gavrila, Claudiu Tarta

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tweet(twitter4j.Status status)
      Constructor that creates a Tweet from a Twitter4j.Status
      Tweet(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String tweet, java.util.Date date)
      Constructor that creates a Tweet using a user ID, the text of the tweet and the date when it was posted

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Date getDate()
      Returns the date when this tweet has been posted
      java.util.ArrayList<Keyword> getInvertedIndex()
      The method creates an inverted index for the current tweet.
      java.lang.String getTweet()
      Returns the text of the tweet stored by this type of object

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tweet

        public Tweet(java.lang.String userId,
     java.lang.String tweet,
     java.util.Date date)
        Constructor that creates a Tweet using a user ID, the text of the tweet and the date when it was posted
        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user who posted the tweet
        tweet - the text of the tweet
        date - the date when the tweet was posted

        Constructor that creates a Tweet from a Twitter4j.Status
        Parameters:
        status - a status returned by Twitter4j

    • Method Detail

      • getTweet

        Returns the date when this tweet has been posted
        Returns:

      • getInvertedIndex

        public java.util.ArrayList<Keyword> getInvertedIndex()
        The method creates an inverted index for the current tweet.
        Returns:
        a list of Keyword objects that were found in this tweet
